Daily Missions:
Hello! You can complete multiple missions with your friends and win prizes. Each instance can be done every 24 hours, two missions are destined for party, and one missions for command channel. Read the tutorial for each mission before starting the challenge.

(Instances re-enter time is 24 Hours)
Instances Tutorial
Instances Rewards List
Cave of the Queen Ant (50-55)
Tower O fFate (82-85)
Behemoth Fortress (82-85)
